meanings.definition: A cassette containing magnetic tape for recording and playing back sound.
meanings.sent1: I found some old audiocassettes in the attic.
meanings.sent2: My dad used to listen to music on audiocassettes.
meanings.sent3: The audiocassettes decided to have a dance party in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like audiocassettes, playing the tunes of the past.
meanings.sent5: The audiocassettes whispered stories of bygone days.

meanings.definition: A type of analog magnetic tape recording format for audio storage.
meanings.sent1: The store still sells audiocassettes for vintage music lovers.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new player to listen to my audiocassettes.
meanings.sent3: The audiocassettes threw a surprise party for the vinyl records.
meanings.sent4: His words were recorded on the audiocassettes of history.
meanings.sent5: The audiocassettes hummed with the melodies of the past.
